annotations.description: The vesper is a problem drink and that should surprise nobody at all. It was created by a writer, Ian Flemming in his book Casino Royal (a James Bond Story) ...
annotations.title: Modern Classics: Vesper Americano

textContent:
1.5oz Gin
.75 Cocchi Americano
.75 Vodka
3 drops Bittern's Hopped Grapefruit Bitters

Stir, Strain into nick and nora, garnish with Grapefruit Peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uMQIDFWlKR4
title: Vesper Americano
